import React from 'react' import { popular } from '../../../../dummyData' import Heading from '../../../common/heading/Heading' import Slider from "react-slick"; const Popular = () => { var settings = { dots: true, infinite: false, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 4, slidesToScroll: 4, initialSlide: 0, responsive: [ { breakpoint: 1024, settings: { slidesToShow: 3, slidesToScroll: 3, infinite: true, dots: true } }, ] }; return ( <>
{popular.map((val) => { return (
{val.catgeory}

{val.title.slice(0, 40)}...

) })}
) } export default Popular
